Name: Hen in the Foxhouse
About the game: A Chicken rampage is about to sweep through Fox City! Defeat the foxes of Fox City and destroy their infrastructure by throwing eggs. Originally made for a game jam with the theme 'egg', but updated with plenty of new features. Be a Chicken! Lay eggs! Crush the political and economical structures that hold up Fox society!
